text: @TMobile @Tesla This would be the perfect journey car that would take my family and me to see Mt. Rushmore! COVID-19 has really changed the way we live and move amongst each other, but there are still amazing things to see and enjoy! 😁 #TMobileTuesdays. #contest #TMobile
